response.original_title: Teddy Rhyme Time: Adventures in Nursery Rhyme Land
response.overview: An enchanting story of two teddies who magically come to life when their human "Huggy Friends" go to sleep, Once 'awake', Max and Mimms make their way to the children's toy box which, when opened, reveals a magical staircase to a world full of Nursery Rhymes and adorable teddy bear characters.
response.title: Teddy Rhyme Time: Adventures in Nursery Rhyme Land

release_dates.note: This is according to the Video Collection International Wikia, date may be incorrect.
